ussr.comm
Class GenericReceiver

java.lang.Object
  ussr.comm.GenericReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Receiver
Direct Known Subclasses:
IRReceiver, RadioReceiver, WiredReceiver
public abstract class GenericReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Receiver

An abstract implementation of the Receiver interface. Provides a receiver device for a module associated with a specific simulated hardware, using a specific type of transmission and with a given buffer size.

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI
